short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily import your candidate data to JazzHR

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
▻  Upload, parse, and import resumes into JazzHR from PDF and Word files.

▻  Streamline your search by collecting and syncing candidate data like:

      ●  Full name
      ●  Email
      ●  Phone number

▻  Source passive candidates from your favorite sites like: LinkedIn, GitHub, AngelList, Behance, Dribble and more.

▻  Spend less time toggling between sites and more time connecting with candidates.

──────────────────────────────
⚠ You need a JazzHR account to use the JazzHR Candidate Importer. Request access here: https://jazzhr.com
